description: This file defines a 'MigrationLoader' class that provides a static method to load database migration scripts, specifically SQL scripts for setting up a 'notes' table, as part of a note-taking application's database setup.

classes.name: MigrationLoader
classes.description: A utility class that provides a method to load migration SQL scripts in order for database setup.

methods.name: loadMigrations
methods.description: A static method that asynchronously returns a list of SQL migration scripts.
